    Function reference

    Initialize Storms

    Functions for initializing Storm/StormsList objects

    StormsDataset-class StormsDataset
    StormsDataset object
    defDatabase()
    Initialize a StormsDataset object
    Storm-class Storm
    Storm object
    StormsList-class StormsList
    StormsList object
    Storms()
    Initialize a StormsList object

    Getters

    Functions for getting data associated with Storm/StormsList objects

    getStorm()
    Extract a Storm
    getNames()
    Get name(s) of storm(s)
    getSeasons()
    Get the cyclonic seasons of storm(s)
    getSSHS()
    Get maximum SSHS reached of storm(s)
    getNbObs()
    Get the number of observations available
    getInObs()
    Get indices of observations within the extended LOI
    getObs()
    Get observations available
    getNbStorms()
    Get number of Storms in StormsList
    getLOI()
    Get LOI from a Storms object
    getBuffer()
    Get the extended LOI from a Storms object
    getBufferSize()
    Get buffer size from a Storms object

    Compute products

    Functions for computing products

    spatialBehaviour()
    Compute indicators of storm behaviour
    temporalBehaviour()
    Compute indicators of storm behaviour

    Plot

    Functions for plotting tracks and products

    plotStorms()
    Plot storm track(s)
    plotBehaviour()
    Plot rasterized information storm behaviour

    Write

    Function for writing data in .GeoTiff or .nc format

    writeRast()
    Save raster(s) in the desired format

    Data

    Examples data provided by this package

    pam
    PAM tropical cyclone
    sts_nc
    ERICA and NIRAN tropical cyclones
    eezNC
    EEZ of New Caledonia
    IBTRACS_SP
    South Pacific storms database
